text: This is a list of mayors of Nuremberg (Oberbürgermeister der Stadt Nürnberg) since 1818: * 1818–1821: Christian Gottfried Lorsch * 1821–1853: Jakob Friedrich Binder * 1854–1867: Maximilian von Waechter * 1867–1891: Otto Freiherr von Stromer * 1892–1913: Georg Ritter von Schuh (FVP) * 1913–1919: Otto Geßler (FVP) * 1920–1933: Hermann Luppe (DDP) * 1933–1945: Willy Liebel (NSDAP) * 1945: Julius Rühm (NSDAP) * 1945: Martin Treu (SPD) * 1945–1948: Hans Ziegler (SPD) * 1948–1951: Otto Ziebill (SPD) * 1952–1957: Otto Bärnreuther (SPD) * 1957–1987: Andreas Urschlechter (SPD) * 1987–1996: Peter Schönlein (SPD) * 1996–2002: Ludwig Scholz (CSU) * since 2002: Ulrich Maly (SPD) ==See also== * Timeline of Nuremberg * Nuremberg
title: List of mayors of Nuremberg
